roleset.name: come up with a new idea
roleset.note: PIONEER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pioneer' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 29.8, no other framed members. Comparison with 'innovate'. (from pioneer.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Achenbaum pioneered negotiated fees, which often worked out to less than 15%.
example.arg: negotiated fees, which often worked out to less than 15%
